Title: Voicemail
Plot: In the opener to the second season, troubled Tommy Gavin is having a difficult time adjusting to life at his new uneventful firehouse after the volatile split with his old crew.  On top of this he is still looking for his missing wife who has kidnapped his three children and he has to come to terms with the fact that his dead cousin?s wife is pregnant with his baby.  His frustrations come to a head and he has a meltdown with a street vendor selling 9/11 memorabilia.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Connor  Martin,  Jack  Leary,  Adam  Mastrelli,  Tony Cucci,  James Biberi,  Robert Turano,  David Vadim,  Terry Serpico,  Lee Tergesen,  Samuel Ray Gates,  Ron Domingo,  Albert Jones,  Rick Zahn,  Rob Munk,  Kris
